main event: A single bright, silver, reddish, and green object was observed at Glasgow AFB in Montana on August 28, 1965.
interesting points: The object was observed for a total of 2 hours and 27 minutes,The object moved at a fast speed to the north before stopping and moving to the east,It displayed a varied rising course and was visible for one hour and 27 minutes,The observers used binoculars to enhance their view of the object,The conclusion of the report suggested that the object was a balloon based on its motion and description.
sighted object: one round object, bright silver with hazy red and green edges
witness description: Capt Hubert R. Martin, Lt William T. Schroedter, Edward L. Schmitt, and ADC Jesse J. Allen, all highly reliable personnel.
